description: This file provides utility functions for creating sandboxed HTML content and iframes. The createSandboxedHtml function generates a complete HTML document with embedded postMessage scripting for height auto-resizing, while createSandboxedIframe creates an iframe element configured with sandbox attributes, srcdoc, and styles.

methods.name: createSandboxedHtml(rawHtml)
methods.description: Builds a full HTML document with embedded height postMessage script, handling both full document snippets and fragments by injecting or wrapping as needed.

methods.name: createSandboxedIframe(htmlString)
methods.description: Creates an iframe element configured with sandbox attributes, srcdoc containing sanitized HTML, and styling for embedding in other documents.
